SALESFORCE HELP
DOCS
VISUALFORCE B2B COMMERCE RELEASE NOTES AND UPGRADE GUIDE
Order Review 2.0: Deliver a Faster Standard Checkout Experience

Version 2.0 of the Order Review section of the Checkout page is optimized to improve performance for the standard checkout flow. Version 2.0 provides the same user experience as version 1.0, but has faster data retrieval and quicker response times.

Where: This change applies to B2B Commerce for Visualforce Summer ’19 (version 4.11) in Lightning Experience and Salesforce Classic in Enterprise, Performance, Unlimited, and Developer editions.

How: After you upgrade the available global data, the Use Order Review Page 2.0 configuration setting is available under the Order Review module. This setting is TRUE by default.

To support this change, the Backbone.js data model for the Order Review page is updated, which can affect the Handlebars templates that render the page. If you previously extended these default Handlebars templates, review the new order review data model in your browser's console window. If necessary, update your extensions to handle the changed data.

NOTE
Version 2.0 of the Order Review section of the Checkout page is compatible only with version 2.0 of the Shopping Cart page. If the Cart module's Use Cart Page 2.0 configuration setting is FALSE, the Order Review page continues to deploy the Backbone.js data model for version 1.0.
The Order Review page version 2.0 doesn't apply to line-level independence.
B2B Commerce for Visualforce continues support for the Order Review page version 1.0. To revert, change the Use Order Review Page 2.0 configuration setting to FALSE.
SEE ALSO
Show Fees and Charges in the Order Review Section of the Checkout Page
